price: 53. Miyey iskula dardaarmeen arrinkani8? Mayee’ waa qolo xadgudub badan.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
footnotes: 8. Miyey gaaladii beri hore u soo gudbiyeen hadalladan kuwaan hadda jira, sidaa darteed ay u yidhaahdeen isla hadalkoodii oo kale?.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
